sentences.sentence: There were two stragglers twenty yards back.
But blue stragglers seem to follow a different path.
sentences.translation: 但是蓝离散星好象遵循着不同的演化途径。

sentences.sentence: When we got there, there was no party just a few stragglers hanging out and drinking.
sentences.translation: 到了那后，我们发现并没有聚会， 只有几个流浪汉在那喝酒、闲逛。
